name: Craig's Quest
description:
This is a Prototype build of a Video game ensemble. 6 musicians collaborated and gave music to different levels ranging from hip hop to Orchestral to Metal to Synth-wave and Glitch.

Created using Unreal Engine 4.27.

Instructions:

Download and Extract the "WindowsNoEditor.rar" file

Open "sidescrollah.exe"

Collaborators

James Ellender : Designer for Subway Level and composed music for the Subway and Hallway level

Gene Cleary: Composed music for the Hallway level and Haunted Mansion

Connor Lizarraga: Designed the Castle level. Composed music for the Mansion and the Castle

James Pye: Designed the Vaporwave Level, Composed the music for the same

Alexander Domeika: Sound effects, Implemented Audio and Music through Wwise

Harmanan Singh (Harmanone): Designer for Hallway, Mansion and Mindbender Level, Composed music for the Mindbender Level
